summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 1 October to end of Friday 1 October GMT
description: On Friday our weather continues to be influenced by an Atlantic low pressure system centered north west of the UK and Ireland.<br/><br/>Mostly wet and windy ensuring good dispersion of any local emissions. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
